title: EF Education-Cannondale boss Esra Tromp and Her Two Projects: Creating a Team, Becoming a New Mom
content:
Tromp has been busy creating the new EF Education-Cannondale squad while she also prepares to have her first child at the start of 2024.

Read the full article at EF Education-Cannondale boss Esra Tromp and Her Two Projects: Creating a Team, Becoming a New Mom on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
